forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 11pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 9 to 14 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 8am. Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As twilight deepens over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a gentle hint of moisture, whispering of the patchy drizzle that promises to visit later in the night. The city, bathed in a fading golden light, stands clear yet contemplative, with the Golden Gate Bridge emerging in silhouette against the darkening sky. The temperature settles into a warm embrace of around 58 degrees, complemented by a brisk breeze from the west-southwest, inviting a light jacket to shield against the evening coolness. 

Tomorrow dawns with a hint of the coastal charm inherent to this part of the world. Expect gentle drizzles in the early hours, gradually giving way to a sun-drenched day, where the temperature will rise to a pleasant 69 degrees, then retreat slightly in the afternoon’s embrace. With a modest wind blowing in at 9 to 20 miles per hour, ideal conditions unfold for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a visit to local cafés, where one can savor warm drinks and the rich aromas of baked goods. As you venture out, perhaps don a light sweater or pullover to navigate the interplay of warmth and cool breezes, capturing the essence of San Francisco’s ever-changing weather. The allure of the day beckons for exploration, whether through quiet gardens or bustling markets, reminding you of the city's vibrant pulse intertwined with the tranquil moments that define it.
